events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect product.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! I’m Emma, I’ll assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also send a photo of the item you received so we can verify the mistake and proceed quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. Attached is a photo showing the item I received does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send the incorrect item back.
That sounds great, thank you for addressing this quickly. I appreciate your help resolving this.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund is complete and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
